question:
You are renting a flat from an agency. Your contract was for one year but you need to leave the flat two months early.
Write a letter to the agency. In your letter
 introduce yourself
ask to leave the flat before the contract finishes
explain why you need to break the contract.
text: I had rent a flat in the No.2 wall street building through your agency one year ago. I  appreciated your agency helping me to settle in a nice apartment when I was the first time move to England and knew nothing about the apartment information. I am really enjoy the living atmosphere and the nice neighbourhood.

Even though I am quite enjoying the current living condition, I have to move to another city because my company reallocate me for a promotion which I will be a manager there. I think it is a great opportunity for my job career and I have made a decision to accept the offer. Therefore, I am asking if it is possible to terminate the renting contract two months earlier since I will leave the city in the near future. I hope you can understand my current situation and do not hesitate to contact me back if you have further questions to discuss the detail about the termination of the renting contract.
I look forward to hearing from you.

error_list.error_des: The verb am appears to be unnecessary here.
